snippet: President Mahinda Rajapaksa swore in a trusted aide, Mohan Peiris, on Tuesday to replace the chief justice he fired.
abstract: Sri Lankan Pres Mahinda Rajapaksa swears in trusted aide Mohan Peiris to replace Shirani Bandaranayake, chief justice he fired; move could lead to judicial crisis if lawyers and judges who view it as illegal refuse to cooperate.
lead_paragraph: President Mahinda Rajapaksa swore in a trusted aide, Mohan Peiris, on Tuesday to replace the chief justice he fired.

headline.seo: Sri Lanka: New Chief Justice Sworn In
headline.main: Sri Lanka: New Chief Justice Sworn In
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka: New Chief Justice Sworn In
